title: 1895 Lavista  Advertised on Craiglist is a "SCAM"
posting_body: The ad you see on Craigslist for ad house for rent in 1895 Lavista for $1050 is a Scam!!!!
How can someone rent a house out for $1050 when the mortgage payment is more than $2000.
The other Scam that is rampant on Craigslist is the listing of Apartment Complexes Multiple times.

For example  Suffex Green or 100 Preston or East Perimeter Pointe, or 7100 Dawson,  or Ridge Brook, or Las Palmas  in the Craigslist search box and you'll see how many dozens of time a day they Auto-Post to Craigslist.
Do they really have the units available that they are advertising or is it "Bait and Switch?"
Google the complexes and you'll see that the prices are different from those advertised on Craigslist.
For the few legitimate landlords who post, we get drowned out by all of the Spam!!!!
Please remember If it's to good to be true.....it probably is!!!!
This message is important for anyone seeking affordable housing in Midtown, Downtown Atlanta, Buckhead, Intown or any place  surrounding Atlanta.
